revised_title: An Analysis of Anomalous Lightning Discharges and Their Leader Processes
tldr: The authors study various types of lightning discharges and their leader processes, focusing on abnormal first leader processes and discharges with new channels for part of their length. They analyze the behavior of these discharges and find that they follow principles similar to the more common types of discharges. The authors provide detailed descriptions and measurements of these processes, contributing to the understanding of lightning phenomena.
